output_list.description: The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. It allows an attacker to create an arbitrary amount of tokens, allowing them to be transferred to any user, including the owner. The attacker can also set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, allowing them to gain unauthorized access to any smart contract.

output_list.reason: Integer overflow in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`.
Integer overflow in the line `balances[_to] += _value;`, allowing an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
